text: On that Day they will be speechless.He said:Nobody will speak for himself by [presenting an] argument (bi-ḥujja), unless it be by the exhibitingof helplessness (ʿajz) and servanthood (ʿubūdiyya), and by refraining from infringements [of the Law] (mukhālafāt) and crimes (jarāʾim).His words, Exalted is He:
